general.name: Security & Privacy - FileVault
general.description: Enables and manages FileVault encryption on macOS computers. Personal Recovery Key will be escrowed within Jamf Pro and enablement will be required upon next login.
general.payloads: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd"> <plist version="1"><dict><key>PayloadUUID</key><string>795AB72E-C3E8-44ED-8B97-31E9B6A30BE4</string><key>PayloadType</key><string>Configuration</string><key>PayloadOrganization</key><string>Insight - USA</string><key>PayloadIdentifier</key><string>795AB72E-C3E8-44ED-8B97-31E9B6A30BE4</string><key>PayloadDisplayName</key><string>Security & Privacy - FileVault</string><key>PayloadDescription</key><string>Enables and manages FileVault encryption on macOS computers. Personal Recovery Key will be escrowed within Jamf Pro and enablement will be required upon next login.
